_description: Dropdown menu data - models, personas, themes that populate the picker dropdowns

models._comment: Available AI models organized by provider
models._purpose: Model options displayed in the model picker dropdown

Anthropic.name: Claude 4 Sonnet
Anthropic._note: Display name shown to user, ID used for API calls

models._usage: Add new providers as top-level keys, models as arrays with name/id objects

personas._purpose: Persona options displayed in the persona picker dropdown
personas._usage: Add new categories as top-level keys, personas as arrays with name/id objects

themes._purpose: Theme options displayed in the theme picker dropdown

Dark.name: Rainy Night
Dark._note: Current dark theme with warm accents

Dark.name: Midnight Blue
Dark._note: Dark theme with blue accents (not yet implemented)

Dark.name: Deep Purple
Dark._note: Dark theme with purple accents (not yet implemented)

Light.name: Forest Green
Light._note: Light theme with green accents (not yet implemented)

themes._usage: Theme IDs must match actual theme file names in aetherVault/themes/

defaults._purpose: Initial state for each dropdown picker
defaults._modelNote: Must match an existing model ID from the models section
defaults._personaNote: Must match an existing persona ID from the personas section
defaults._themeNote: Must match an existing theme ID from the themes section AND a theme file
defaults._usage: Change these to set different default selections on app startup
